name: XWUI Container Component
description: Container component with max-width and optional centering. Typically used for page/content containers to constrain width and center content. Supports custom max-width, centering, and padding.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

maxWidth.description: Maximum width of the container (string or number)

center.description: Whether to center the container horizontally

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the container

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

content.description: Content element or HTML string to display in the container

children.description: Children element or HTML string (alias for content)
